name: Bright Minds Learning Center
shortDescription: Specialized coaching for children with dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds offers personalized programs for dyslexic learners using research-backed teaching strategies and one-on-one sessions.

name: Focus First Institute
shortDescription: Empowering students with ADHD to thrive.
longDescription: Focus First uses behavior-based coaching techniques to improve attention, routine, and academic performance.

name: The Learning Tree
shortDescription: Inclusive therapies for children with ASD.
longDescription: A multidisciplinary team offers speech, occupational, and behavioral therapy in a sensory-friendly environment.

name: ReadWell Center
shortDescription: Support for literacy and comprehension difficulties.
longDescription: ReadWell provides phonics, vocabulary, and written expression programs using modern tools.

name: MindGrow Academy
shortDescription: Helping children build planning, memory, and focus skills.
longDescription: Cognitive-behavioral strategies and tailored action plans support executive function growth.

name: SkillBridge Support Hub
shortDescription: A bridge to better learning outcomes.
longDescription: SkillBridge offers diagnostic evaluations, IEPs, and subject-specific academic support.

name: ThinkSpace Clinic
longDescription: Mindfulness coaching and inclusive strategies for children with unique learning profiles.

name: Pathway Learning Hub
shortDescription: Boosting cognitive skills with interactive sessions.
longDescription: Custom cognitive training for memory, logic, and problem-solving using gamified tools.

name: BrightFuture Support Services
longDescription: Speech therapy, language enrichment, and communication skills training with early intervention focus.

name: NeuroEdge Learning
shortDescription: Advanced learning modules for gifted students.
longDescription: Critical thinking workshops, mentorship, and enrichment activities for high achievers.

name: Harmony Skills Center
longDescription: Group and individual sessions to build communication, empathy, and teamwork skills.

name: StepUp Coaching
longDescription: Applied behavior analysis and reinforcement techniques for adaptive behaviors.

name: EduBridge Institute
longDescription: Personalized remedial lessons for core subjects to help students catch up.

name: Spectrum Support Center
longDescription: Sensory assessments and integration plans for children with sensory processing challenges.
